pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal PK/PD Index Finder // Fits Emax models to pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic (PK/PD) data, estimate key parameters, and visualise model fits for multiple PK/PD indices. Methods are described in Macdougall J (2006) doi:10.1007/0-387-33706-7_9, Spiess AN, Neumeyer N (2010) doi:10.1186/1471-2210-10-6, and Burnham KP, Anderson DR (2004) doi:10.1177/0049124104268644.
